name: Sexy Comedy: It Was a Mistake
name_original: Sexy Comedy: It Was a Mistake
description:
''Sexy Comedy: It Was a Mistake'' is an interactive comedy, inspired by American Pie and ASDF movie.

In this game, you will watch a sketch, and then choose how it will end! The life of those little dudes are in your hands! Will you force them to be assholes? Or will you try to make them be better people? It's up to you to decide in ''Sexy Comedy: It Was a Mistake''
